title: Divided we stand
creator_credit: BBC, Olga Edridge and Rizu Hamid
brief_description: What was expected to be the formation of a “New Germany”, representing features of both the East and the West, has not occurred with re-unification. This program examines the problems and the disappointments that East Germans have had to confront since re-unification.
